function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Influence on individuals, communities, organizations, and governments","category":"Social Expression","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Influence of personal experiences on place attachment","category":"Social Expression","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Continuing increases in the human population, crowding, and human movement","category":"Wealth Distribution","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of rapid adaptation to new circumstances","category":"Resilience","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reliance on tracking applications for monitoring population dynamics","category":"Tools&Apps","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Collective behavior changes due to past epidemic experience","category":"Social Expression","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Managers not networking and sharing information about adaptive responses to covid-19","category":"Collaboration","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of collaboration and networks among mid-size city public service managers","category":"Collaboration","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of networking among park managers","category":"Collaboration","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Encouraging physical interaction through the use of mirrors and banners could lead to unintended close contact and potential spread of contagious diseases.","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Closure of parks with physical barriers and instruction not to visit other parks may lead to overcrowding in the open parks.","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Conversion of roads to pedestrian areas may lead to increased interaction and close contact among pedestrians.","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Non-compliance with protocol by park visitors","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased demand for park access leading to overcrowding","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Mental health issues due to restricted access to green spaces","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of access to parks leading to mental health issues, physical inactivity, and domestic violence consequences","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Crowding in less ventilated and denser spaces due to park closures","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Closure of small gyms leading to reliance on crowded parks for exercise","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Demand for park access leading to non-compliance with safety measures","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Social resistance to following minimal protocol requests such as mask use and distancing.","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Vandalism of warning resources such as yellow ribbons and banners.","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Crowding in restricted areas and resistance to park closures by some users.","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Vandalism of yellow ribbons used to enclose restricted areas","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Evasion of restrictions by young people during nights","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inconsistent communication and response to pandemic urgency","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Coordination challenges in polycentric park management","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Realtime monitoring of iaq parameters may introduce privacy concerns for building occupants.","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited research on prediction systems for iaq monitoring","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Improper data transmission strategy may result in high power consumption and redundant network traffic.","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reliance on statistical analysis software ibm spss statistics for data analysis may introduce errors or biases.","category":"Tools&Apps","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited or no access to real-time iaq monitoring and exposure risk updates for building occupants.","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Contagious disease spread due to poor air quality monitoring and control system","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inaccurate air quality prediction leading to inadequate control measures","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inaccurate quantification of air pollutants leading to improper management","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"High percentage of time spent indoors","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Poor indoor environmental quality due to modern lifestyle choices","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Impact of poor indoor climate on health and productivity","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Cost-effectiveness of indoor climate on high-value work in the office","category":"Wealth Distribution","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Differences in noise levels and communication speed in open-plan vs. closed offices","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Conversion to open-plan offices may lead to a higher risk of contagious disease spread due to increased interaction and reduced physical barriers.","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Mechanical cooling of supply air to lower high temperatures may not effectively control the spread of contagious diseases in the built environment.","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Decreased ventilation rates in office rooms to provide ventilation to central meeting rooms may result in poor indoor air quality and increased risk of disease transmission.","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate ventilation in the toilets may lead to poor indoor air quality and increased risk of disease transmission.","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Different office plans may impact the spread of contagious diseases due to varying spatial layouts and density of people.","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High occupant density can contribute to the spread of respiratory diseases.","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Spread of communicable respiratory diseases through airborne aerosols","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Workspace design may not consider physical distancing measures, leading to a higher risk of disease transmission among employees.","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited use of open-plan office space","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of awareness of economic impact of indoor climate","category":"Wealth Distribution","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inaccurate economic calculations for investments and operations","category":"Wealth Distribution","confidence":"Medium"}]}
